name: Moon Baloon
description: MOOBA (Mutant Moon Balloon) represents a pioneering approach to Web3 gaming, combining engaging arcade-style gameplay with blockchain-based tournaments and real prize distribution. Built on the Solana blockchain, MOOBA creates a sustainable gaming ecosystem where players compete in skill-based tournaments for tangible rewards while contributing to a growing multi-game platform. "Our mission is to transform casual gaming into meaningful competitive experiences where skill, community, and blockchain technology converge to create lasting value for players." Current Implementation
